name: Pet io (opoly)
description:
Pet io is like a trip through the pet store of your dreams! Choose your favorite pets and collect rent every time another player lands on your space. Create a fun strategic opoly-style board game while celebrating our worlds' most diverse pets.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
